description:
An AI generated image of the Oscar-nominated Teri Garr after she passed away at the age of 79.  She was a comedic actor best known for her performances in the movies "Young Frankenstein," "Close Encounters" and "Tootsie".
She started as a background dancer in Elvis Presley movies and went on to have a long film career.  Pauline Kael called her “the funniest neurotic dizzy dame on the screen.”
metaDescription: An AI generated image of Teri Garr after she passed away at the age of 79.
